comment: I like the watch face and the animations. The menu needs to look less like an ad and more like a menu. I tried to remove the year but the option doesn't work. Also, I'd like to see the seconds of the time removable. Thank you for such a cool watch face!

reply.content: Dear ! Thanks for review ! try our another awesome animated Halloween watch.
